posts.title: Gorgeous Girl at Mobil - missed connections
posts.body: You were getting gas when we pulled into the Mobil (across from Hunam Chinese and Lucha Tigre) behind you. You were incredibly good looking and I wished I could've gotten to talk to you before you left. Lemme know what you were wearing and your car.

posts.title: Dollar general on bridge st - missed connections
posts.body: Seen you today walking out of dg. Your name begins with a 'M'. You were carrying your baby. We met up a bunch of times last year. I lost your contact info. Hit me up if you want to pick up where we left off. I was driving the silver car.
